mapper.update: update resv_order, resv_order_tem set resv_order.third_order_no = resv_order_tem.third_order_no where resv_order.resv_order = resv_order_tem.resv_order and resv_order_tem.third_order_no != "" and resv_order_tem.status=resv_order.status and resv_order.business_id = #{businessId};
mapper.select: select * from ( select AVG(consume) as consume ,vip_id from ( select sum(o.payamount)/sum(if(o.actual_num is null,o.resv_num,o.actual_num )) as consume,o.vip_id as vip_id from resv_order o where o.business_id=#{data.businessId} and o.status in (2,3) and o.resv_date >= #{startDate} and o.resv_date < #{endDate} and o.payamount is not null and o.vip_id is not null group by o.batch_no ) avgt group by vip_id )t where 1=1 and t.consume >= #{data.consumeStart} and t.consume < #{data.consumeEnd}

select * from ( select o.resv_date as lastMeatDay,o.vip_id as vip_id from resv_order o where business_id=#{data.businessId} and o.status in (2,3) and o.resv_date >= #{startDate} and o.resv_date < #{endDate} and o.vip_id is not null order by o.resv_date desc ) t group by vip_id

select o.business_id as business_id, if(sum(o.payamount) is null ,0,sum(o.payamount)) as taking, sum(if(o.status=4,1,0)) as recedeTime, sum(if(o.status=1,1,0)) as reserveTableNum, sum(if(o.status in (2,3) ,1,0)) as expenseTime , sum(if(o.vip_id != 0 && o.vip_id is not null && o.status not in (5,6) ,1,0)) as allReserveTime, sum(if(o.app_user_id != 0 && o.app_user_id is not null && o.status not in (5,6) ,1,0)) as appReserveTime from resv_order o where o.resv_date >= #{startDate} and o.resv_date < #{endDate} and o.business_id=#{businessId} group by o.business_id
mapper.update: UPDATE resv_order SET `status` = 2,updated_at=now() WHERE `status`=1 AND resv_date <= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL ${intervalNum} DAY) AND table_id != 0 AND table_area_id != 0 AND isRank != 1

UPDATE resv_order SET `status` = 4,updated_at=now(), unorder_reason = '系统取消' WHERE `status`=1 AND resv_date <= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL ${intervalNum} DAY) AND table_id = 0 AND table_area_id = 0 AND isRank = 1
UPDATE resv_order SET `status` = 3,updated_at=now() WHERE `status`=2 AND resv_date <= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL ${intervalNum} DAY) AND payamount IS NOT NULL AND payamount !=''
mapper.select: select * from resv_order where business_id = #{id} and resv_date = #{time} and `status` = 1 and CONCAT(resv_date," ",dest_time) < SYSDATE() and dest_time != ""
